help.name: Help
help.desc: List commands, or get help for a command.

getpeercount.name: GetPeerCount
getpeercount.desc: Return the number of connections to other nodes.

listpeer.name: ListPeer
listpeer.desc: Return data about each connected network node.

addnode.name: AddNode
addnode.desc: Attempt to add a node into the addnode list.

removenode.name: RemoveNode
removenode.desc: Attempt to remove a node from the addnode list.

listfork.name: ListFork
listfork.desc: If true, list of all forks, or subscribed forks

halvecycle.desc: halve cycle: 0: fixed reward, >0: blocks of halve cycle

getgenealogy.name: GetGenealogy
getgenealogy.desc: Return the list of ancestry and subline.

getblocklocation.name: GetBlockLocation
getblocklocation.desc: Return the location with given block.

getblockcount.name: GetBlockCount
getblockcount.desc: Return the number of blocks in the given fork, includes extended block and vacant block

getblockhash.name: GetBlockHash
getblockhash.introduction: Return a list of block hash in the fork at a specific height.
desc: Return a list of block hash in fork at specific height.
First of the list is the main block hash, others are extended blocks hash in order.

getblock.name: GetBlock
getblock.desc: Return details of a block with given block-hash.

gettxpool.name: GetTxPool
desc: If detail==0, return the count and total size of txs for given fork.
Otherwise,return all transaction ids and sizes in memory pool for given fork.
If serialized=0, return an Object with information about <txid>.
If serialized is non-zero, return a string that is
serialized, hex-encoded data for <txid>.

sendtransaction.name: SendTransaction
sendtransaction.desc: Submit raw transaction (serialized, hex-encoded) to local node and network.

getforkheight.name: GetForkHeight
getforkheight.desc: Return the number of height in the given fork.

listkey.name: ListKey
listkey.desc: Return Object that has pubkey as keys, associated status as values.

getnewkey.name: GetNewKey
getnewkey.desc: Return a new pubkey for receiving payments.

lockkey.name: LockKey
lockkey.introduction: Removes the encryption key from memory, locking the key.
desc: Removes the encryption key from memory, locking the key.
After calling this method, you will need to call unlockkey again.
before being able to call any methods which require the key to be unlocked.
error: {"code":-6,"message":"This method only accepts pubkey or pubkey address as parameter rather than template address you supplied."}

unlockkey.name: UnlockKey
desc: If (timeout) > 0,stores the wallet decryption key in memory for (timeout) seconds.
before being able to call any methods which require the key to be locked.

importprivkey.name: ImportPrivKey
importprivkey.desc: Adds a private key (as returned by dumpprivkey) to your wallet.

response.name: pubkey
response.desc: public key with hex number system

importkey.name: ImportKey
importkey.desc: Reveal the serialized key corresponding to <pubkey>.

response.name: pubkey
response.desc: public key with hex number system

error: {"code":-32602,"message":"Can't import the key with empty passphrase"}

exportkey.name: ExportKey
exportkey.desc: Reveal the serialized key corresponding to <pubkey>.

addnewtemplate.name: AddNewTemplate
addnewtemplate.desc: Return encoded address for the given template id.

importtemplate.name: ImportTemplate
importtemplate.desc: Return encoded address for the given template.

exporttemplate.name: ExportTemplate
exporttemplate.desc: Return encoded address for the given template.

resyncwallet.name: ResyncWallet
desc: If (address) is not specified, resync wallet's tx for each address.
If (address) is specified, resync wallet's tx for the address.

getbalance.name: GetBalance
desc: Get balance of address.
If (address) is not specified, return the balance for wallet's each address.
If (address) is specified, return the balance in the address.

listtransaction.name: ListTransaction
desc: If (offset) < 0,return last (count) transactions,
If (offset) >= 0,return up to (count) most recent transactions skipping the first (offset) transactions.

count.desc: transaction count. If not set, return 10 tx

offset.desc: query offset. If not set, from 0

error: {"code":-6,"message":"Negative, zero or out of range count"}

sendfrom.name: SendFrom
desc: <amount> and <txfee> are real and rounded to the nearest 0.000001
Return transaction id

createtransaction.name: CreateTransaction
desc: <amount> and <txfee> are real and rounded to the nearest 0.000001.
Return serialized tx.

signtransaction.name: SignTransaction
desc: Return json object with keys:
hex : raw transaction with signature(s) (hex-encoded string)
completed : true if transaction has a completed set of signature (false if not)

signmessage.name: SignMessage
signmessage.desc: Sign a message with the private key of an pubkey

listaddress.name: ListAddress
listaddress.desc: List all of the addresses from pub keys and template ids

exportwallet.name: ExportWallet
exportwallet.desc: Export all of keys and templates from wallet to a specified file in JSON format.

example.response: Wallet file has been saved at: /Users/Loading/a.txt

importwallet.name: ImportWallet
importwallet.desc: Import keys and templates from an archived file to the wallet in JSON format.
error: {"code":-401,"message":"Wallet file exported is invalid, check it and try again."}
{"code":-401,"message":"Data format is not correct, check it and try again."}
{"code":-32602,"message":"Can't import the key with empty passphrase"}

makeorigin.name: MakeOrigin

halvecycle.desc: halve cycle: 0: fixed reward, >0: blocks of halve cycle

error: {"code":-6,"message":"Prev block should not be extended/vacant block"}

getpubkeyaddress.name: GetPubkeyAddress
getpubkeyaddress.desc: Return encoded address for the given public key.

gettemplateaddress.name: GetTemplateAddress
gettemplateaddress.desc: Return encoded address for the given template id.

maketemplate.name: MakeTemplate
maketemplate.desc: Return encoded address for the given template id.

decodetransaction.name: DecodeTransaction
decodetransaction.desc: Return a JSON object representing the serialized, hex-encoded transaction.

getwork.name: GetWork
desc: If (prev hash) is matched with the current primary chain,return true
If next block is not generated by proof-of-work,return false
Otherwise, return formatted proof-of-work parameters to work on:
"prevblockheight" : prevblock height
"prevblockhash" : prevblock hash
"prevblocktime" : prevblock timestamp
"algo" : proof-of-work algorithm: cryptonight=1,...
"bits" : proof-of-work difficulty nbits
"data" : work data

result.condition: prev is matched or block is not generated by POW

work.condition: next block is generated by POW

submitwork.name: SubmitWork
desc: Attempt to construct and submit new block to network
Return hash of new block.

type.desc: statistical type: maker: block maker, p2psyn: p2p synchronization

response.name: stattable
desc: statistical data table
1) maker: block maker
-- time: statistical time, format: hh:mm:ss
-- powblocks: number of POW blocks produced in one minute
-- dposblocks: number of DPOS blocks produced in one minute
-- tps: number of TX produced in one second
2) p2psyn: p2p synchronization
-- time: statistical time, format: hh:mm:ss
-- recvblocks: number of synchronized receiving blocks in one minute
-- recvtps: number of synchronized receiving TX in one second
-- sendblocks: number of synchronized sending blocks in one minute
-- sendtps: number of synchronized sending TX in one second
